comment:
* This class provides callbacks mechanism for the BluetoothHapClient profile.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: void onPresetSelected(@NonNull BluetoothDevice device, int presetIndex, @PresetSelectionReason int reason)
methods.comment:
* Invoked to inform about HA device's currently active preset.
         *
         * @param device remote device,
         * @param presetIndex the currently active preset index.
         * @param reason reason for the selected preset change
         * @hide

methods.name: void onPresetSelectionFailed(@NonNull BluetoothDevice device, @PresetSelectionFailureReason int reason)
methods.comment:
* Invoked inform about the result of a failed preset change attempt.
         *
         * @param device remote device,
         * @param reason failure reason.
         * @hide

methods.name: void onPresetSelectionForGroupFailed(int hapGroupId, @GroupPresetSelectionFailureReason int reason)
methods.comment:
* Invoked to inform about the result of a failed preset change attempt. * *

The implementation will try to restore the state for every device back to original * * @param hapGroupId valid HAP group ID, * @param reason failure reason. * @hide

methods.name: void onPresetInfoChanged(@NonNull BluetoothDevice device, @NonNull List<BluetoothHapPresetInfo> presetInfoList, @PresetInfoChangeReason int reason)
methods.comment:
* Invoked to inform about the preset list changes.
         *
         * @param device remote device,
         * @param presetInfoList a list of all preset information on the target device
         * @param reason reason for the preset list change
         * @hide

methods.name: void onSetPresetNameFailed(@NonNull BluetoothDevice device, @PresetNameChangeFailureReason int reason)
methods.comment:
* Invoked to inform about the failed preset rename attempt.
         *
         * @param device remote device
         * @param reason Failure reason code.
         * @hide

methods.name: void onSetPresetNameForGroupFailed(int hapGroupId, @GroupPresetNameChangeFailureReason int reason)
methods.comment:
* Invoked to inform about the failed preset rename attempt. * *

The implementation will try to restore the state for every device back to original * * @param hapGroupId valid HAP group ID, * @param reason Failure reason code. * @hide

methodNames: void onPresetSelected(@NonNull BluetoothDevice device, int presetIndex, @PresetSelectionReason int reason)
void onPresetSelectionFailed(@NonNull BluetoothDevice device, @PresetSelectionFailureReason int reason)
void onPresetInfoChanged(@NonNull BluetoothDevice device, @NonNull List<BluetoothHapPresetInfo> presetInfoList, @PresetInfoChangeReason int reason)
void onSetPresetNameFailed(@NonNull BluetoothDevice device, @PresetNameChangeFailureReason int reason)
